bike.description: C10 ultra high-modulus carbon disc-only frame w/ shaped top tube for portaging, integrated tapered head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: C10 ultra high-modulus carbon seatstays w/ post-mount disc tabs, oversized chainstays and carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-770 Cross carbon blade, alloy crown w/ tapered alloy steerer & alloy dropout
Challenge Grifo clincher, 60 tpi, 700c x 32mm, folding
Avid BB5 mechanical disc for road, 160mm / 140mm rotors
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated w/ carbon top cover
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
